host.description: Hostname of the MySQL database server.
host.title: Hostname

port.description: Port of the MySQL database server. Default is 3306.
port.title: Port

database.description: Name of the database to sync data to.
database.title: Database

username.description: Username to use to access the database.
username.title: Username

ssl_mode.description: SSL connection mode. Use 'required' for encrypted connections.
ssl_mode.title: SSL Mode

oneOf.title: No Tunnel
oneOf.description: No ssh tunnel needed to connect to database

oneOf.title: SSH Key Authentication
oneOf.description: Connect through a jump server tunnel host using username and ssh key

tunnel_host.description: Hostname of the jump server host that allows inbound ssh tunnel.
tunnel_host.title: SSH Tunnel Jump Server Host

tunnel_port.description: Port on the proxy/jump server that accepts inbound ssh connections.
tunnel_port.title: SSH Connection Port

tunnel_user.description: OS-level username for logging into the jump server host
tunnel_user.title: SSH Login Username

ssh_key.description: OS-level user account ssh key credentials in RSA PEM format ( created with ssh-keygen -t rsa -m PEM -f myuser_rsa )
ssh_key.title: SSH Private Key

oneOf.title: Password Authentication
oneOf.description: Connect through a jump server tunnel host using username and password authentication

tunnel_host.description: Hostname of the jump server host that allows inbound ssh tunnel.
tunnel_host.title: SSH Tunnel Jump Server Host

tunnel_port.description: Port on the proxy/jump server that accepts inbound ssh connections.
tunnel_port.title: SSH Connection Port

tunnel_user.description: OS-level username for logging into the jump server host
tunnel_user.title: SSH Login Username

tunnel_user_password.description: OS-level password for logging into the jump server host
tunnel_user_password.title: Password

tunnel_method.description: Whether to initiate an SSH tunnel before connecting to the database, and if so, which kind of authentication to use.
tunnel_method.title: SSH Tunnel Method
